Regulation Name(s): Calculator/Data Processing Module for Clinical Use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Blood glucose meters (Bayer Breez, Bayer Contour, Abbott Freestyle Freedom, Abbott Freestyle Freedom Lite, Abbott Freestyle Lite, Abbott Precision Xtra, Roche ACCU-CHEK Aviva, Roche ACCU-CHEK Compact Plus, Lifescan OneTouch Ultra 2, Lifescan OneTouch Ultra Mini)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ALR Technologies Health-e-Connect System, a web-based software platform for collecting and reviewing historical blood glucose data to aid diabetes management
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use in home and clinical settings by people with diabetes and healthcare providers to aid in the review, analysis, and evaluation of historical glucose test results and usage data supporting effective diabetes management
